column4: Hi People i ve a big problem. i installed Ubuntu and then i installed windows XP and now my GRUB Boot Loader is overwritten . I tried recovering using the Grub Bootloader guide in Ubuntu help but it does not work could someone please help me . I ve some important data which i cannot afford to lose
could some one help me please? i dont get the grub boot loader installed at all
you can rescue your data with live dvd
